## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bf3e8611090160aa15eebc899ec461d429494a6a8241ae5ed0ecafc3bbd79a8a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'o2-modal' @ 97.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
